name: Google old favicon
description: Changes google's favicon into the old one (showed on the screen). Should work everywhere besides bookmarks/history window/sidepanel. Should work also for everyone.
additional_info:
Every feedback is appreciated, tell me if you like it ;p. Post me also if something will work wrong. If new favicon will be displayed somewhere then post me its url (or better the favicon source's url ;p).

If anyone have any idea how to style bookmarks/history window/sidepanel favicons then post me too, I'll be happy to check it out ;p.

28.06.2017: Added recognition for panel menus and back\froward context menu.
